alert.note: Alert for Cheshire; Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 28 at 3:05PM EST until January 29 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations between 4 and 6 inches for a storm total of 4 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Western and Central Hillsborough and Cheshire Counties. * WHEN...Until 4 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Periods of moderate and heavy snow will combine with low visibility to create dangerous driving conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will be heaviest this evening into the overnight. Snowfall rates up to an inch an hour are possible. The heaviest snowfall will taper off Monday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org
